name: Skinner Box [PROTOTYPE]
description:
Prototype series 2: SKINNER BOX Have you ever been a pigeon? Guess what... CONTROLS

WASD to move.

Right Click to interact.

After playing this game, I would you recommend to see this video or google "Burrhus Frederic Skinner".

The goal of this series is to experiment with different challenges, mechanics, dynamics & aesthetics. For each prototype there will be given a different theme.

All the prototypes are made in 1 day using (preferably) Unreal Engine 3.

click... click... click..click.clicKcliKCLICKCLICKCLICK!

Prototype 2/3
